column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque is completely different then every other BBQ place in the city.  In Chicago
column2: it is all the norm to expect sweet
column4: not at Smoque my friend.  We are talking about a vinegar based sauce
column5: which I'm told (mainly by the Food network) that is common in the Carolinas.  Vinegar in BBQ? Its good
column6: its really good and the ribs are tender
column7: try the St. Louis style ribs
column8: COME ON JUST DO IT!  Fries
column10: cole slaw (mixed with a vinegar based sauced) is refreshing not creamy and heavy
column11: and if you go and don't get a peach cobbler
column12: you need to be smacked! JK
